attributes.action: ban anyone who claims to be able to contact Deity's or entities from practising in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The claims of Vicars or any religious leader to be able to contact Deity's such as Jesus, Yahweh, Muhammad or other name, is a practice which seeks to exploit those who are seeking something divine in their lives or are in otherwise in need of answers or re-assurance. 

There is no proven scientific evidence whatsoever that these people can contact any of these Deity's and speak on their behalf, as such they should be prevented from practising what is in essence a fraud and from taking money (such as in the form of Tithings to the church, or similar) or otherwise exploiting those who are vulnerable

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
